user.title: SmartThings Find login (manual)
user.description:
Log in via browser and paste your Cookie header.

1) Open SmartThings Find: [{stf_url}]({stf_url})
2) DevTools (F12) → Network
3) Select the `chkLogin.do` request (refresh if needed)
4) Copy Request Headers → `Cookie:` (the whole line)
5) Paste it below

error.invalid_cookie: Invalid cookie format. Paste the full Cookie header line.
error.auth_failed: Authentication failed. Cookie expired or invalid.
